title: A Mexican American Artist Finds Heroes in Farmworkers
description: Narsiso Martinez’s portraits honor the immigrants behind big American agribusiness.
dc:creator: Jori Finkel
category: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
Museum of Latin American Art (Long Beach, Calif)
media:credit: Nolwen Cifuentes for The New York Times
media:description: Narsiso Martinez’s painting “Legal Tender” (2022) at the Museum of Latin American Art. The central figure is based on an undocumented California farmworker from Guerrero, Mexico.
